plugin-data.name: Floating-Image-v2
plugin-data.description: Display an interactive image with click behaviors, animation control, and customizable positioning

image-url-help: Enter the URL of the image to display (GIF or PNG format)
redirect-url-help: URL to redirect visitors when they click the image (opens in new tab)
image-size-help: Width of the image in pixels (50-500). Height scales automatically.
position-x-help: Distance from left edge of the screen (0-100 percent)
position-y-help: Distance from top edge of the screen (0-100 percent)
z-index-help: Stacking order (higher numbers appear on top)
opacity-help: Image transparency level (0.1 = very transparent, 1.0 = fully opaque)
config-note: Configure your interactive image settings below. The image will be static until first click (for GIFs), redirect on single click, and close on triple click.
